TITLE: Knowledge Building
DEF: Creation, validation and improvement of collective conceptual artifacts as pioneered by Scardamalia and Bereiter
TASK: The Knowledge Building pattern engages with the pedagogy pionered by Marlene Scardamalia and Carl Bereiter. It involves learners actively constructing knowledge through inquiry, discussion, and reflection. The pattern targets: authentic learning experiences, resources for inquiry, and opportunities for peer collaboration and feedback.
